channel.title: A question to devs regarding modifying particle effects.
channel.description:
Hey folks, i've been asking few questions in store page discussions, but seems like noone reads them or something, so i'll ask here.
I am not sure what you did, but i can't replace particle effects, no matter how i try. I made new explosion particle ( grenade_explosion_01 ), i made an addon for it, and put few sounds to test. Sounds work fine, but not particle effect, it's default. I tried to replace .pcf file with mine in bms particles folder, but still no luck, even if i remove bms particles folder it doesn't matter. It's like game is told to use only particles from bms_misc, which is really lame for me, because i can't do anything with particles, and i planned so much. I am currently working on a HL1 explosion recreation on BM, here's work in progress video of it :
[youtu.be/4w71d5gVreE](https://youtu.be/4w71d5gVreE)
Do you have any solution or will this be "fixed" in the next patch? It would be also great if you could control which particle to spawn via script file, so i could randomize explosions too, if you can add that that'll be great. Also if you could delete the leftovers of old explosion from the particle explosion - that will be great.
Another question is, in-game tools are not available, i treid to launch the game with -tool -nop4, but nothing happens.
Thanks.

item.title: A question to devs regarding modifying particle effects.
item.dc:creator: Gunship_Mark_II
item.description:
At this point i do question myself if i really want to make something for this game, i’ve planned a huge particle effects overhaul, not just 1 Classic HL1 explosion recreation, but the tools for making content have been broken since the latest update including the one of the most important features and aspects of the game - steam workshop, if that is not one of the prioritization points for them, then i don’t know what it is besides Xen. I’ve been asking devs on the store page, for at least telling me that they are aware of the issue, but i got no answer. I came here with even more info, and the story repeats. At least you replied, so that can be considered as a plus, half broken plus. If i sound “entitled” to you, because i might know what’s the reason behind the problem is, i had my fair share of source related coding before. If i had a source code i could’ve tested that myself, at least i said to them where to dig for the solution. Guess i ask for too much then. If you consider what i ask as a “bitching” then i hope my “bitching” will be at least heard by developers.

Read full topic
